title: Deep Learning Hybrid Model Design for Mulberry Leaf Disease Detection

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic deep learning theory and CNN architecture, proficiency in Python programming
context.additional_context: Targeting advanced mathematics experts with practical agricultural image analysis experience

learning_goals: Explain the principles of combining VGG-16 and CapsNet and propose solutions for image rotation/deformation challenges
Implement the WheCNet hybrid model to achieve over 85% accuracy in wheat leaf disease image classification
Apply dropout techniques and fully connected layer optimization strategies to prevent overfitting in practical scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
